sections.description: A WordPress plugin that automatically synchronizes incomplete billing and shipping addresses in WooCommerce, solving the common issue where customers have complete information in one address type but incomplete in the other.
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Upload the plugin files to /wp-content/plugins/woocommerce-address-sync/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
  3. Go to WooCommerce > Address Sync to configure settings

sections.faq:
How does the plugin work?

The plugin automatically syncs addresses when orders are saved or created, copying missing fields from the complete address to the incomplete one.

Can I choose sync direction?

Yes, you can sync billing to shipping only, shipping to billing only, or both ways.

Does it work with HPOS?

Yes, the plugin is fully compatible with WooCommerce High-Performance Order Storage.

How do updates work?

The plugin automatically checks for updates from GitHub. When a new version is available, you'll see an update notification in your WordPress admin.

Updates not showing?

Go to WooCommerce > Updates Check and click 'Clear Update Cache' then 'Force Check for Updates'.
